alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington, northwestern Hyde and northeastern Beaufort Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 557 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pike Road, or 14 miles southeast of Plymouth, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pungo, Pike Road, Wenona and Pungo Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
